title: 85/49/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 December 1984 changing the import arrangements established by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3420/83 and applied in the Benelux countries, Denmark, Italy and the United Kingdom in respect of the People's Republic of China (Only the English, Danish, French, Italian and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 17 December 1984
changing the import arrangements established by Council Regulation (EEC) No 3420/83 and applied in the Benelux countries, Denmark, Italy and the United Kingdom in respect of the People's Republic of China
(Only the Danish, Dutch, English, French and Italian texts are authentic)
(85/49/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative restrictions on the release for free circulation in the Member States specified in the Annex, of the goods therein indicated originating in China, are hereby abolished.

This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, the Kingdom of the Netherlands, the Kingdom of Denmark, the Italian Republic and the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
This Decision shall apply from 1 January 1985.
